2016-0980 (La. 9/16/16)

Clifton THOMASSIE, III, Christopher Thomassie, Fran Thomassie and Nicole Thomassie, Individually and on Behalf of Their Father Clifton Thomassie, Jr. v. Tonya JAGNEAUX, M.D., State of Louisiana Through the LSU Health System, and Baton Rouge General Medical Center NO. 2016-CC-0980 Supreme Court of Louisiana. September 16, 2016

Applying For Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs, Parish of E. Baton Rouge, 19th *206Judicial District Court Div. D, No. 624,421; to the Court of Appeal, First Circuit, No. 2015 CW 1920;

IN RE: State of Louisiana through Dr. Tonya Jagneaux;—Defendant;

Denied.
